about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Way of the Hunter and enjoy 11 tracks of original music from the game and its four major expansions.

 

Go on a global adventure with the sounds of the African Savanna, a Scandinavian retreat, the hills and valleys of the Pacific Northwest. Travel musically from the Southern Hemisphere of New Zealand to the frosty nights and shiny Aurora of Alaska.

 

Composed and produced by Grand Beats Productions from Slovakia.
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Way of the Hunter and enjoy 11 tracks of original music from the game and its four major expansions.

 

Go on a global adventure with the sounds of the African Savanna, a Scandinavian retreat, the hills and valleys of the Pacific Northwest. Travel musically from the Southern Hemisphere of New Zealand to the frosty nights and shiny Aurora of Alaska.

 

Composed and produced by Grand Beats Productions from Slovakia.
